column6: We've got a ton of bugs we need to sort through! It's never ending.
column15: I care! Whatever, you're the game director.

column6: I don't like the direction of our art style. We need to redo it.
column8: Thank you! This game is gonna look great!

column6: It's taking too much time to make all these levels. Can we cut back the scale of the game?
column8: Cutting content hurts, but it'll make the game better.

column6: We need a new sound studio to record our SFX. How 'bout it?
column8: Oooohh! My dreams have come true!
column15: And once again, sound takes a backseat. You'll regret it!

column6: The project is under budget. Should we splurge and do something nice for the team?
The project is ahead of schedule. Should we let the team take some time off?
I found this pudding in the fridge. I want to eat it. I should it eat it. Can I eat it?
Did you seriously let the engineer eat my pudding from the fridge!? How could you!?
column8: And it better be the same brand of pudding.
column15: Oh! I will have my revenge. Just you wait.

column6: We are extremely overbudget! We need to lay some staff off.
column8: I hate this part of the job.
column15: I'm sure the team will appreciate it.

column6: How much should we invest in the fidelity of our art.
